Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel!”

Reviews.Title: “Great location, familiar and good service, but a little disappointing.”

Reviews.Content: wife little disappointed hotel highly recommended sites internet negatives bath water leaking floor bathroom cleaning poor didn’t exchange bedding breakfast simple bad worst times door clean sleeping time packing leave tour positives hotel staff attentive modern equipped airconditioning essential summer location block subway close restaurants shopping vatican free speed internet despite negatives recomend stay
